SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.soa.process.validation
Interface ValidationContext

public interface ValidationContext

Provides context to an ActivityValidator, such as the activity definition to validate and access to a validation report in which errors and warnings can be stated.

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Element getActivityDefinition()
          Returns the definition, or configuration, of the activity to validate in a DOM structure.
 java.lang.String getActivityName()
          Returns the name of the activity being validated so that the validator can add activity specific errors and warnings.
 OrchestrationProcess getProcess()
          Returns access to the process the activity is defined in.
 ValidationReport getReport()
          Returns the validation report for the process being validated so that the validator can add activity specific errors and warnings.
 

Method Detail

org.w3c.dom.Element getActivityDefinition()
Returns the definition, or configuration, of the activity to validate in a DOM structure.

Returns:
DOM Element holding the activity definition, or configuration.

Returns access to the process the activity is defined in.
